players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Bob was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I find it strange that Bob was the one who got eliminated during the night. Let's be careful and make informed decisions today."
Charlie: "I agree with Alice's sentiment. Let's be cautious and focus on gathering more information before making any hasty decisions."

Diana: "'I share Alice's concern about the sudden elimination of Bob. Let's keep a close eye on each other and work together to ensure we don't make any wrong decisions based on insufficient information.'..."

Charlie: "I believe it is important that we all remain vigilant and work together to uncover the truth behind Bob's sudden elimination. Let us continue gathering information and discussing our suspicions openly."

You: "Let us not jump to conclusions based on assumptions or personal biases. We need solid evidence to make informed decisions. I suggest we all share any information we have, no matter how insignificant it may seem, as it could potentially lead us closer to the truth..."

Diana: "Let's not forget that we lost a valuable member of our community in Bob. It is essential that we work together to uncover the truth behind his elimination and ensure that justice is served. I encourage everyone to share any information they may have, no matter how..."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Diana voted for Charlie (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
Charlie was arrested

players.name: Diana
memory: You're Diana, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Bob was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Alice: "I find it strange that Bob was the one who got eliminated during the night. Let's be careful and make informed decisions today."
Charlie: "I agree with Alice's sentiment. Let's be cautious and focus on gathering more information before making any hasty decisions."

You: "'I share Alice's concern about the sudden elimination of Bob. Let's keep a close eye on each other and work together to ensure we don't make any wrong decisions based on insufficient information.'..."

Charlie: "I believe it is important that we all remain vigilant and work together to uncover the truth behind Bob's sudden elimination. Let us continue gathering information and discussing our suspicions openly."

Alice: "Let us not jump to conclusions based on assumptions or personal biases. We need solid evidence to make informed decisions. I suggest we all share any information we have, no matter how insignificant it may seem, as it could potentially lead us closer to the truth..."

You: "Let's not forget that we lost a valuable member of our community in Bob. It is essential that we work together to uncover the truth behind his elimination and ensure that justice is served. I encourage everyone to share any information they may have, no matter how..."
